verses.verse: Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1121>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H5983><s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them;

And <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1121>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H5983><s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> thou <S%H559>saidst,<s%> <S%H1889>Aha,<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it was <S%H2490>profaned;<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it was <S%H8074>desolate;<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H1980>went<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity;<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> thee to the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> for a <S%H4181>possession,<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>set<s%> their <S%H2918>palaces<s%> in thee, and <S%H5414>make<s%> their <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> in thee: <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> thy <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> thy <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> a <S%H5116>stable<s%> for <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and the <S%H1121>Ammonites<s%> <S%H5983><s%> a couching <S%H4769>place<s%> for <S%H6629>flocks:<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> thou hast <S%H4222>clapped<s%> thine <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H7554>stamped<s%> with the <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> in <S%H5315>heart<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H7589>despite<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> thee for a <S%H957>spoil<s%> to the <S%H1471>heathen;<s%> and I will cut thee <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will cause thee to <S%H6>perish<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>countries:<s%> I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> thee; and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Because <S%H3282>that<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and <S%H8165>Seir<s%> do <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is like unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen;<s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> from the <S%H4480>cities,<s%> <S%H5892><s%> from his <S%H4480>cities<s%> <S%H5892><s%> which are on his <S%H4480>frontiers,<s%> <S%H7097><s%> the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of the <S%H776>country,<s%> <S%H1020>Beth-jeshimoth,<s%> <S%H1186>Baal-meon,<s%> and <S%H7156>Kiriathaim,<s%>

Unto the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H1121>Ammonites,<s%> <S%H5983><s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> them in <S%H4181>possession,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> the <S%H1121>Ammonites<s%> <S%H5983><s%> may <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
And I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> upon <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Because <S%H3282>that<s%> <S%H123>Edom<s%> hath <S%H6213>dealt<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> by <S%H5358>taking<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> and hath greatly <S%H816>offended,<s%> <S%H816><s%> and revenged <S%H5358>himself<s%> upon them;

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> I will also stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> it; and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> it <S%H2723>desolate<s%> from <S%H4480>Teman;<s%> <S%H8487><s%> and they of <S%H1719>Dedan<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> upon <S%H123>Edom<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and they shall <S%H6213>do<s%> in <S%H123>Edom<s%> according to mine <S%H639>anger<s%> and according to my <S%H2534>fury;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5360>vengeance,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> by <S%H5360>revenge,<s%> and have <S%H5358>taken<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> with a <S%H7589>despiteful<s%> <S%H5315>heart,<s%> to <S%H4889>destroy<s%> it for the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H342>hatred;<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3774>Cherethims,<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>coast.<s%>

And I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> upon them with <S%H2534>furious<s%> <S%H8433>rebukes;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I shall <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> upon them.
